reviewText: Compelling movie of what happens to a family trying to protect loved ones from tragedy. A real movie with a real story. Had to go see it twice because I couldn't stop thinking about it. A first movie for the writer/actor/producer and director. Great job by all.
Interesting film. Makes you think about life and how precious each moment is with our loved ones.

A beautifully acted, compelling story. I'm confident the family dynamic will be familiar to most of us (which family member are you?). A second viewing is recommended in order to catch all the clues you missed the first time. You'll see this writer and director again, for sure!

I watched AFTER without any knowledge of it. The first time I watched it, I almost did myself a disservice by taking it at its surface thinking, the actors were all really good but okay... When I watched it again with my wife, not only did the film hit me significantly deeper but  something became very clear...

It's not your typical film and thank god for that. It's nice to have that every once and while.
Well, this film is very well-made, with powerful performances, but the family secret is totally unrealistic; I don't see how the family could keep up their charade ad infinitum - very silly.
I loved it. I laughed. I cried. About 15 family and friends ordered the dvd after watching it.

I saw a review on this that said it was one of the best films they've reviewed all year.  I could not agree more. I can't really get into the plot as that would ruin it but it is a must watch and I won't be surprised if it becomes one of those classic films that gave insight to a horrible time in this country.
Check out reviewer rankings and review history before watching this one.  It may affect your judgement on how you spend your money.
I saw this movie in the theaters and loved it.  I am buying the DVD!!
I was in Rochester when this was shot there, and I viewed the filming. It's an emotionally powerful secret and the movie has a quality cast.
I mean, Pablo Schreiber is great. But this plot is... well, it needed work.
This was a terrific drama. I recommend it to others. Compelling plot revolving around a family secret. Debut work by Sabrina Gennarino who wrote, produced, and acts in it as well. Watched it twice.
Kept me wondering until the very end.
God movie
i loved this movie
This film is very special to me as it was filmed in my neighborhood in Rochester, NY.
it's ok
I love this!  How can I not?  My son stars in it so I might be a bit biased!
So glad I watched this- crazy intense in a good way!
melodramtic tv fare.  nothing more.
